p: Data were expressed as mean along with standard deviation. Significant difference between groups was analyzed with One-way ANOVA in anticoagulant and antidepressant assays and two-way ANOVA in analgesic and anti-inflammatory assays followed by the Post Hoc Dunnett test. Graphs were made in GraphPad Prism 5.0 (La Jolla, CA, USA). The results were considered to be significant at p < 0.05.
